tls:text.tls:line: If officials in the [rural] districts do not adhere to the system of laws,

sense.def: the legal system

tls:text.tls:line: did not use the same legal system

sense.def: the current legal system

tls:text.tls:line: because official duties, legal regulations, and political instruction have been neglected within the country;

sense.def: the current legal system

tls:text.tls:line: when executing his laws and orders

sense.def: laws and orders

tls:text.tls:line: Thereafter, keep them informed with laws and orders,

sense.def: legal rules and regulations

tls:text.tls:line: If the statutes and orders are clear,

sense.def: legal rules and regulations

tls:text.tls:line: Prohibitions do not take preceedence over those close [to the prince] and those who are honored;

sense.def: laws and prohibitions

tls:text.tls:line: If laws and prohibitions are not established,

sense.def: laws and prohibitions

tls:text.tls:line: When judging cases involving laws and punishments

sense.def: the laws and regulations of all kind

tls:text.tls:line: Public laws are ignored while individual crookedness prevails.

sense.def: the impartial law of the land =國法

tls:text.tls:line: Public laws are ignored while individual crookedness prevails.

sense.def: administrative practice: impartial (public and not personal or private) rule of law

tls:text.tls:line: if personal whishes are carried out to the detriment of public laws,

sense.def: the impartial law of the land =國法

tls:text.tls:line: go against public law,

sense.def: the impartial law of the land =國法

tls:text.tls:line: Since the person on high casts aside impartiality and the law and listens to self-serving talk,

sense.def: the impartial law of the land =國法

tls:text.tls:line: Now, to set aside impartial laws in order to bestow personal favors

sense.def: the impartial law of the land =國法

sense.def: administrative practice: impartial (public and not personal or private) rule of law

tls:text.tls:line: Indeed, to set aside impartial laws

sense.def: the impartial law of the land =國法

tls:text.tls:line: Indeed, to set aside impartial laws

sense.def: administrative practice: impartial (public and not personal or private) rule of law

tls:text.tls:line: the people will turn their backs on impartial laws and rush to those who are in power.

sense.def: the impartial law of the land =國法

tls:text.tls:line: the people will turn their backs on impartial laws and rush to those who are in power.

sense.def: offend against (the law etc)

tls:text.tls:line: the people will turn their backs on impartial laws and rush to those who are in power.

sense.def: position of power; strategic advantage; power; clout

tls:text.tls:line: and punishes the people

sense.def: the impartial law of the land =國法

tls:text.tls:line: "If the laws of a country are inconsistent,

sense.def: law of the land

tls:text.tls:line: If he does not pay careful attention to his penal laws,

sense.def: criminal law

tls:text.tls:line: Criminal laws proliferate, but wickedness is not restrained.

sense.def: criminal law

tls:text.tls:line: Public laws are carried out while individual crookedness is prevented.

sense.def: administrative practice: impartial (public and not personal or private) rule of law

tls:text.tls:line: in order to disrupt impartial laws,

sense.def: administrative practice: impartial (public and not personal or private) rule of law

tls:text.tls:line: and impartial law will daily decline.

sense.def: administrative practice: impartial (public and not personal or private) rule of law

seg.line: 忠臣之欲明法術以致主之所欲而除主之所惡者，

tls:text.tls:srcline: 忠臣之欲明法術以致主之所欲而除主之所惡者，
tls:text.tls:line: Loyal ministers are ones who wish to clarify political methods based on law in order to achieve what the ruler wished and eliminate what the ruler hates.505

sense.def: law-based art of government

seg.line: 生殺之柄不制於主而在群下，
